Typealiases.html#/s:15ColorComponents0A1.name: ColorCompontentValue
Typealiases.html#/s:15ColorComponents0A1.abstract: The type of values that can be used with color components.

Typealiases.html#/s:15ColorComponents018.name: AlphaFloatingPointColorComponents
Typealiases.html#/s:15ColorComponents018.abstract: Describes a type that represents color components whose value is a floating point type.

Structs/ImageColorsCalculator/ColorDista.name: weightedSRGB
Structs/ImageColorsCalculator/ColorDista.abstract: Weighted sRGB calculation. R, G and B values are weighted to approximate human perception.

Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.name: init(image:)
Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.abstract: Creates a new calculator using the given image.

Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.name: averageColor(in:)
Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.abstract: Calculates the average color for the image, optionally restricting it to a given rect.

Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.name: maxComponentColor(in:)
Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.abstract: Calculates the color with the maximum component values for the image, optionally restricting it to a given rect.

Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.name: init(nsImage:)
Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.abstract: Creates a calculator using the given NSImage. Returns nil if the NSImage could not be converted to a CIImage.

Structs/ImageColorsCalculator/ColorDista.name: ColorDistanceMode
Structs/ImageColorsCalculator/ColorDista.abstract: Describes the mode that is used to calculate color distances.

Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.name: prominentColors(as:in:distanceAs:pixelLimit:colorLimit:)
Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.abstract: Calculates the most prominent colors in the image, optionally restricting it to a given rect.

Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.name: mostProminentColor(as:in:distanceAs:pixelLimit:colorLimit:)
Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/s:17.abstract: Calculates the color that is most prominent in the image, optionally restricting it to a given rect.

Structs/BWA.html.name: BWA
Structs/BWA.html.abstract: A black/white color components representation with an alpha channel.

Structs/HSB.html.name: HSB
Structs/HSB.html.abstract: An opaque HSB (hue, saturation, brightness) color components representation.

Structs/HSBA.html.name: HSBA
Structs/HSBA.html.abstract: An HSBA (hue, saturation, brightness, alpha) color components representation.

Structs/RGB.html.name: RGB
Structs/RGB.html.abstract: An opaque RGB (red, green, blue) color components representation.

Structs/RGBA.html.name: RGBA
Structs/RGBA.html.abstract: An RGBA (red, green, blue, alpha) color components representation.

Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html.name: ImageColorsCalculator
Structs/ImageColorsCalculator.html.abstract: A calculator that calculates various colors for a given image.

Protocols/FloatingPointColorComponents.h.name: changeBrightness(by:)
Protocols/FloatingPointColorComponents.h.abstract: Changes the brightness by the given percent value.

Protocols/FloatingPointColorComponents.h.name: isDarkColor
Protocols/FloatingPointColorComponents.h.abstract: Returns whether these color components represent a dark color (brightness less than 0.5).

Protocols/FloatingPointColorComponents.h.name: isBrightColor
Protocols/FloatingPointColorComponents.h.abstract: Returns whether these color components represent a light color (brightness greater than or equal to 0.5).

Protocols/AlphaColorComponents.html#/s:1.name: isClearColor
Protocols/AlphaColorComponents.html#/s:1.abstract: Returns whether these color components represent a clear color (alpha is zero).

Protocols/ColorComponents.html#/s:15Colo.name: Value
Protocols/ColorComponents.html#/s:15Colo.abstract: The value type of these color components.

Protocols/ColorComponents.html.name: ColorComponents
Protocols/ColorComponents.html.abstract: Describes a type that represents (opaque) color components without an alpha channel.

Protocols/AlphaColorComponents.html.name: AlphaColorComponents
Protocols/AlphaColorComponents.html.abstract: Describes a type that represents color components with an alpha channel.

Protocols/FloatingPointColorComponents.h.name: FloatingPointColorComponents
Protocols/FloatingPointColorComponents.h.abstract: Describes a type that represents (opaque) color components whose value is a floating point type.

Extensions/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/i.name: init(uiImage:)
Extensions/ImageColorsCalculator.html#/i.abstract: Creates a calculator using the given UIImage. Returns nil if the UIImage could not be converted to a CIImage.

Extensions/NSColorSpace.html#/s:So12NSCo.name: colorComponentsDefaultGray
Extensions/NSColorSpace.html#/s:So12NSCo.abstract: The default color space used by BW and BWA to create NSColors when no color space was specified.

Extensions/NSColorSpace.html#/s:So12NSCo.name: colorComponentsDefaultHSB
Extensions/NSColorSpace.html#/s:So12NSCo.abstract: The default color space used by HSB and HSBA to create NSColors when no color space was specified. This is currently equivalent to NSColorSpace.colorComponentsDefaultRGB.

Extensions/NSColorSpace.html#/s:So12NSCo.name: colorComponentsDefaultRGB
Extensions/NSColorSpace.html#/s:So12NSCo.abstract: The default color space used by HSB and HSBA to create NSColors when no color space was specified. This is currently equivalent to NSColorSpace.deviceRGB.
